bodhi_desc.base_text: Nationality: Unknown$NL;Age: Unknown$NL;$NL;Bodhi is known as one of the greatest legends in the world of crime, but few know the man behind the mask. As the founding father of the Ex-Presidents gang, Bodhi's renowned in the criminal underworld for his extreme athleticism and daring heists. His recent feats of strength in Mumbai and Austria got Bain's attention, granting him an invitation to the Payday Gang.
bodhi_desc.loc_text: สัญชาติ: ไม่ทราย$NL;อายุ: ไม่ทราบ$NL;$NL;Bodhi is known as one of the greatest legends in the world of crime, but few know the man behind the mask. As the founding father of the Ex-Presidents gang, Bodhi's renowned in the criminal underworld for his extreme athleticism and daring heists. His recent feats of strength in Mumbai and Austria got Bain's attention, granting him an invitation to the Payday Gang.

bonnie_desc.base_text: Nationality: Scottish$NL;Age: 43$NL;$NL;Bonnie is from Glasgow. That should be enough to strike fear into a man's heart, but Bonnie is also from 1980's Glasgow. These years, the Thatcher era, made already tough towns even harder, and bred a generation of determined, unforgiving Scots. Bonnie is cut from this cloth.
bonnie_desc.loc_text: สัญชาติ: สก๊อตแลนด์$NL;อายุ: 43$NL;$NL;Bonnie is from Glasgow. That should be enough to strike fear into a man's heart, but Bonnie is also from 1980's Glasgow. These years, the Thatcher era, made already tough towns even harder, and bred a generation of determined, unforgiving Scots. Bonnie is cut from this cloth.

chico_desc.base_text: Nationality: Cuban$NL;Age: Unknown$NL;$NL;They don't make 'em like Tony anymore. A fast talker who knows what he wants and how to get it. He's the real deal when the shit hits the fan, a true-born heister. He doesn't back down for anyone and he dishes it out just as hard as he can take it. This guy's got balls.
chico_desc.loc_text: สัญชาติ: คิวบา$NL;อายุ: ไม่ทราบ$NL;$NL;They don't make 'em like Tony anymore. A fast talker who knows what he wants and how to get it. He's the real deal when the shit hits the fan, a true-born heister. He doesn't back down for anyone and he dishes it out just as hard as he can take it. This guy's got balls.

cn_crime_spree_brief.base_text: A Crime Spree is an endless series of randomly selected heists, executed in succession. With each heist you complete, your Rank and Reward will increase! Each 20th or 26th rank you will need to choose a modifier and each 50th rank there is an increase to enemy health and damage, that will make the next heists harder to complete.$NL;$NL;Heisters need to be at least level 60 or Infamy 1 and be able to pay the Continental Coin fee to go on a Crime Spree.$NL;$NL;##If you invite your crew, make sure they started their own Crime Spree before joining in order to gain Ranks and Rewards as well.##
cn_crime_spree_brief.loc_text: A Crime Spree is an endless series of randomly selected heists, executed in succession. With each heist you complete, your Rank and Reward will increase! Each 20th or 26th rank you will need to choose a modifier and each 50th rank there is an increase to enemy health and damage, that will make the next heists harder to complete.$NL;$NL;Heisters need to be at least level 60 or Infamy 1 and be able to pay the Continental Coin fee to go on a Crime Spree.$NL;$NL;##If you invite your crew, make sure they started their own Crime Spree before joining in order to gain Ranks and Rewards as well.##

dialog_crew_loadout_help_text.base_text: The AI Teammates will fill the empty player slots in your own lobby as soon as you start the game. dialog_preplanning_help.base_text: Preplanning allows you to learn more about the target and gives you the tools to plan out your perfect heist.$NL;$NL;If you are planning to do a stealth job, focus on surveillance, easier access, and bypassing security. If you plan on going loud, plant supplies at strategic points, and choose fast approaches and exits.$NL;$NL;Preplanning is paid for with cash and favors; however, you can only call so many favors before you raise suspicions and the feds start looking for you. Choose wisely: some plans call for a lot of favors, while others only take a single phone call.$NL;$NL;Expensive, complex operations like safe cracking and escape plans require a vote. In a tie, the host has a casting vote. The host can also override all decisions on placements (but he can't force you to pay for anything you don't agree with).
dialog_preplanning_help.loc_text: Preplanning allows you to learn more about the target and gives you the tools to plan out your perfect heist.$NL;$NL;If you are planning to do a stealth job, focus on surveillance, easier access, and bypassing security. If you plan on going loud, plant supplies at strategic points, and choose fast approaches and exits.$NL;$NL;Preplanning is paid for with cash and favors; however, you can only call so many favors before you raise suspicions and the feds start looking for you. Choose wisely: some plans call for a lot of favors, while others only take a single phone call.$NL;$NL;Expensive, complex operations like safe cracking and escape plans require a vote. In a tie, the host has a casting vote. The host can also override all decisions on placements (but he can't force you to pay for anything you don't agree with).

dragan_desc.base_text: Nationality: Croatian$NL;Age: 45$NL;$NL;Dragan may be a former cop, but he's a former Croatian cop, which means his methods make the MPDC look like timid babysitters. He was brought to America and accepted into the Payday Gang as a favor to The Butcher. While there were some early suspicions regarding his true loyalties, his ability and commitment are indisputable.
dragan_desc.loc_text: Nationality: Croatian$NL;Age: 45$NL;$NL;Dragan may be a former cop, but he's a former Croatian cop, which means his methods make the MPDC look like timid babysitters. He was brought to America and accepted into the Payday Gang as a favor to The Butcher. While there were some early suspicions regarding his true loyalties, his ability and commitment are indisputable.

dragon_desc.base_text: Nationality: Japanese$NL;Age: 52$NL;$NL;In his youth, Jiro was never accepted, until he found his way into the yakuza. Yet even here, despite his loyalty and ability, he was never fully embraced and was ultimately betrayed. Following a lengthy prison term, Jiro has come to America to find his long-lost son, Kento.
dragon_desc.loc_text: Nationality: Japanese$NL;Age: 52$NL;$NL;In his youth, Jiro was never accepted, until he found his way into the yakuza. Yet even here, despite his loyalty and ability, he was never fully embraced and was ultimately betrayed. Following a lengthy prison term, Jiro has come to America to find his long-lost son, Kento.

ecp_female_desc.base_text: Nationality: Israeli$NL;Age: 29$NL;$NL;Rumor has it that Hila underwent extreme training in the Israeli military, and while she keeps denying it publicly, something definitely caught Bain's attention when he asked her and her spouse Ethan to join the gang. Officially, they were brought in to give the gang a much needed public PR boost in light of certain developments regarding the FBI, but as to the real reason... only Bain knows for sure.
ecp_female_desc.loc_text: Nationality: Israeli$NL;Age: 29$NL;$NL;Rumor has it that Hila underwent extreme training in the Israeli military, and while she keeps denying it publicly, something definitely caught Bain's attention when he asked her and her spouse Ethan to join the gang. Officially, they were brought in to give the gang a much needed public PR boost in light of certain developments regarding the FBI, but as to the real reason... only Bain knows for sure.

ecp_male_desc.base_text: Nationality: American$NL;Age: 32$NL;$NL;A little bit of David to the internet's proverbial Goliath, Ethan is proof that you can never really know what goes on inside Bain's head. As a skilled social media broadcaster, Ethan and his spouse Hila drew the legal ire of some individuals with their documentary work and were forced to spend a minor fortune defending themselves, leaving them financially vulnerable. His skills in public relations and engagement attracted the interest of Bain, who convinced him and his wife to join Payday with promises of restitution, fortune, and glory.
ecp_male_desc.loc_text: Nationality: American$NL;Age: 32$NL;$NL;A little bit of David to the internet's proverbial Goliath, Ethan is proof that you can never really know what goes on inside Bain's head. As a skilled social media broadcaster, Ethan and his spouse Hila drew the legal ire of some individuals with their documentary work and were forced to spend a minor fortune defending themselves, leaving them financially vulnerable. His skills in public relations and engagement attracted the interest of Bain, who convinced him and his wife to join Payday with promises of restitution, fortune, and glory.

jacket_desc.base_text: Nationality: American$NL;Age: Unknown$NL;$NL;Allegedly, he once wiped out the entire Russian Mafia in Miami all on his own. His background in the military and his unflinching attitude towards over-the-top violence has made him an excellent hitman - or "messenger" as some like to call it. For unknown reasons he is completely mute and chooses to communicate only with the help of a tape recorder - playing back bits and pieces of language learning tapes, PAs and documentary narrations instead of speaking.
jacket_desc.loc_text: Nationality: American$NL;Age: Unknown$NL;$NL;Allegedly, he once wiped out the entire Russian Mafia in Miami all on his own. His background in the military and his unflinching attitude towards over-the-top violence has made him an excellent hitman - or "messenger" as some like to call it. For unknown reasons he is completely mute and chooses to communicate only with the help of a tape recorder - playing back bits and pieces of language learning tapes, PAs and documentary narrations instead of speaking.

jimmy_desc.base_text: Nationality: Unknown$NL;Age: Unknown$NL;$NL;I had my doubts at first, I'll admit, but Jimmy has turned out to have all the skills to excel as a heister of Crime.Net caliber. He has no limits, never turning down a contract and lives every day like it's his last. He is loyal and has proven to be an excellent addition I never thought we needed.
jimmy_desc.loc_text: Nationality: Unknown$NL;Age: Unknown$NL;$NL;I had my doubts at first, I'll admit, but Jimmy has turned out to have all the skills to excel as a heister of Crime.Net caliber. He has no limits, never turning down a contract and lives every day like it's his last. He is loyal and has proven to be an excellent addition I never thought we needed.

jowi_desc.base_text: Nationality: American$NL;Age: 40s$NL;$NL;John Wick is a quiet and calm former hitman. He has a seemingly ageless physique, probably from his background as a boxer. John and Chains know each other from before as they used to be in the military together.$NL;$NL;After having gone dark, John recently resurfaced and helped Chains out of a delicate situation. In return, John told Chains he was in need of a crew. How could Chains say no to an old friend?
jowi_desc.loc_text: Nationality: American$NL;Age: 40s$NL;$NL;John Wick is a quiet and calm former hitman. He has a seemingly ageless physique, probably from his background as a boxer. John and Chains know each other from before as they used to be in the military together.$NL;$NL;After having gone dark, John recently resurfaced and helped Chains out of a delicate situation. In return, John told Chains he was in need of a crew. How could Chains say no to an old friend?

joy_desc.base_text: Nationality: Japanese$NL;Age: 22$NL;$NL;Joy's been a cyber criminal since her younger teens. She's a skilled hacker, invaluable when it comes to tech and computers. But she also knows how to handle a gun and she's as tough as they come in spite of her young age.
joy_desc.loc_text: Nationality: Japanese$NL;Age: 22$NL;$NL;Joy's been a cyber criminal since her younger teens. She's a skilled hacker, invaluable when it comes to tech and computers. But she also knows how to handle a gun and she's as tough as they come in spite of her young age.

max_desc.base_text: Nationality: Mexican$NL;Age: 33$NL;$NL;Sangres is a dangerous man. He spent many years working as an enforcer and assassin for a drug cartel in Monterrey, Mexico. Then one day he decided to defect and crossed the border to the US, looking to make the big bucks. Gage introduced him to the Payday Gang. He's as skilled as he's ruthless and with those revolvers he can really light things up. And yeah... check out that razor-sharp machete.

He's as skilled as he's ruthless and with those revolvers he can really light things up. And yeah... check out that razor-sharp machete.

menu_bodhi_desc_codex.base_text: Bodhi is known as one of the greatest legends in the world of crime, but few know the man behind the mask. As the founding father of the Ex-Presidents gang, Bodhi's renowned in the criminal underworld for his extreme athleticism and daring heists. His recent feats of strength in Mumbai and Austria got Bain's attention, granting him an invitation to the Payday Gang.

menu_bonnie_desc_codex.base_text: Bonnie is from Glasgow. That should be enough to strike fear into a man's heart, but Bonnie is also from 1980's Glasgow. These years, the Thatcher era, made already tough towns even harder, and bred a generation of determined, unforgiving Scots. Bonnie is cut from this cloth.

menu_challenge_any_100_headshot_kills_de.base_text: Precision and effectiveness can often go hand-in-hand with brutal mercy. We, well most of us, don't take pleasure in the necessary downing of our enemies, so why not ease their suffering with a quick kill?

menu_challenge_any_6_jobs_desc.base_text: Reports have come in that the crime rate is at its lowest point this decade. Lets do something about that, finish 6 jobs on any difficulty.

menu_challenge_armored_1.base_text: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Boat
menu_challenge_armored_1.loc_text: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Boat

menu_challenge_armored_1_desc.base_text: The old west got it all wrong. The best way to rob a train is when it's standing still. Fewer trips to clean it out and less strain on the horses, y'know?
menu_challenge_armored_1_desc.loc_text: The old west got it all wrong. The best way to rob a train is when it's standing still. Fewer trips to clean it out and less strain on the horses, y'know?

menu_challenge_armored_1_objective.base_text: On the Transport: Train Heist, steal and secure 20 bags worth of ammo.
menu_challenge_armored_1_objective.loc_text: On the Transport: Train Heist, steal and secure 20 bags worth of ammo.

menu_challenge_armored_2_desc.base_text: You wouldn't believe the stuff you can find in armored cars if you look hard enough. But you gotta wonder why someone would ship plans by truck in this day and age...
menu_challenge_armored_2_desc.loc_text: You wouldn't believe the stuff you can find in armored cars if you look hard enough. But you gotta wonder why someone would ship plans by truck in this day and age...

menu_challenge_armored_2_objective.base_text: On any Armored Transport heist, find the plans for the Train Heist.
menu_challenge_armored_2_objective.loc_text: On any Armored Transport heist, find the plans for the Train Heist.

menu_challenge_armored_3.base_text: You Should Have Put a Ring on It
menu_challenge_armored_3.loc_text: You Should Have Put a Ring on It

menu_challenge_armored_3_desc.base_text: Gold on wheels. Ain't it sweet? If you manage to catch wind of some, make sure you bring back many nice bags of the shiny bricks.
menu_challenge_armored_3_desc.loc_text: Gold on wheels. Ain't it sweet? If you manage to catch wind of some, make sure you bring back many nice bags of the shiny bricks.

menu_challenge_armored_3_objective.base_text: Finish any Armored Transport heist, having secured at least 9 bags of gold.
menu_challenge_armored_3_objective.loc_text: Finish any Armored Transport heist, having secured at least 9 bags of gold.

menu_challenge_art_ghost_desc.base_text: Sometimes the best way to prove that thieves like us can be just as cultured as art snobs is to take their precious items nice and quite-like, with no bashing of skulls.
menu_challenge_art_ghost_desc.loc_text: Sometimes the best way to prove that thieves like us can be just as cultured as art snobs is to take their precious items nice and quite-like, with no bashing of skulls.

menu_challenge_art_ghost_obj.base_text: In the Art Gallery job, steal all marked paintings and leave in stealth without killing anybody. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.
menu_challenge_art_ghost_obj.loc_text: In the Art Gallery job, steal all marked paintings and leave in stealth without killing anybody. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.

menu_challenge_assault_rifle_100_kills_d.base_text: Kill 100 enemies using only assault rifles.
menu_challenge_assault_rifle_100_kills_d.loc_text: Kill 100 enemies using only assault rifles.

menu_challenge_bain_4_jobs_desc.base_text: Bain is desperate for your attention. Finish 4 of Bain's jobs on any difficulty.
menu_challenge_bain_4_jobs_desc.loc_text: Bain is desperate for your attention. Finish 4 of Bain's jobs on any difficulty.

menu_challenge_bat_3_desc.base_text: Some people are never satisfied. Give them diamonds, and they still want more. Heisters are usually that kind of people, aren't they?
menu_challenge_bat_3_desc.loc_text: Some people are never satisfied. Give them diamonds, and they still want more. Heisters are usually that kind of people, aren't they?

menu_challenge_bat_3_objective.base_text: In the Diamond job, secure 10 bags of additional loot.
menu_challenge_bat_3_objective.loc_text: In the Diamond job, secure 10 bags of additional loot.

menu_challenge_bat_4_desc.base_text: Sometimes, it's not all about being quiet. Speed can be just as important for a professional. The bigger the job, the higher the prestige if you can employ both successfully.
menu_challenge_bat_4_desc.loc_text: Sometimes, it's not all about being quiet. Speed can be just as important for a professional. The bigger the job, the higher the prestige if you can employ both successfully.

menu_challenge_bat_4_objective.base_text: In the Diamond job, steal the Diamond and escape in under 10 minutes.
menu_challenge_bat_4_objective.loc_text: In the Diamond job, steal the Diamond and escape in under 10 minutes.

menu_challenge_bat_6_desc.base_text: Chaos and mayhem can be rather fun- especially if you're the cause of it. Never pass up a chance to mess around with your enemies expectations...
menu_challenge_bat_6_desc.loc_text: Chaos and mayhem can be rather fun- especially if you're the cause of it. Never pass up a chance to mess around with your enemies expectations...

menu_challenge_bat_6_objective.base_text: In the Diamond job, complete the diamond puzzle, then purposefully set off the alarm, steal the Diamond and escape on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
menu_challenge_bat_6_objective.loc_text: In the Diamond job, complete the diamond puzzle, then purposefully set off the alarm, steal the Diamond and escape on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

menu_challenge_berry_2_desc.base_text: When you infiltrate a deep, dark and secret facility, you need to make sure to leave it empty of valuables when it's time head back to the safe house.
menu_challenge_berry_2_desc.loc_text: When you infiltrate a deep, dark and secret facility, you need to make sure to leave it empty of valuables when it's time head back to the safe house.

menu_challenge_berry_2_objective.base_text: In the Beneath the Mountain job, secure all of the loot from the vaults and mountain-top in the escape helicopter.
menu_challenge_berry_2_objective.loc_text: In the Beneath the Mountain job, secure all of the loot from the vaults and mountain-top in the escape helicopter.

menu_challenge_berry_3_desc.base_text: If every heister does his or her equal share, a job can get done very quickly. Let's see if you can pull off a job with the brutal precision of a commando.
menu_challenge_berry_3_desc.loc_text: If every heister does his or her equal share, a job can get done very quickly. Let's see if you can pull off a job with the brutal precision of a commando.

menu_challenge_berry_3_objective.base_text: In the Beneath the Mountain job, open the 4 vaults that contain loot within 10 minutes of starting the heist on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
menu_challenge_berry_3_objective.loc_text: In the Beneath the Mountain job, open the 4 vaults that contain loot within 10 minutes of starting the heist on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

menu_challenge_big_deal_desc.base_text: The Elephant has a lot riding on the Framing Frame job. Leave no room for error. Trade nine paintings.
menu_challenge_big_deal_desc.loc_text: The Elephant has a lot riding on the Framing Frame job. Leave no room for error. Trade nine paintings.

menu_challenge_big_deal_objective.base_text: On day 2 of the Framing Frame job, trade 9 paintings.
menu_challenge_big_deal_objective.loc_text: On day 2 of the Framing Frame job, trade 9 paintings.

menu_challenge_bigbank_3_desc.base_text: You'd be surprised how much one person can carry. How many trips to the vault can you stand?
menu_challenge_bigbank_3_desc.loc_text: You'd be surprised how much one person can carry. How many trips to the vault can you stand?

menu_challenge_bigbank_3_objective.base_text: Complete The Big Bank job with 16 secured bags.
menu_challenge_bigbank_3_objective.loc_text: Complete The Big Bank job with 16 secured bags.

menu_challenge_bigbank_4_objective.base_text: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist in under 12 minutes on the Hard difficulty or above.
menu_challenge_bigbank_4_objective.loc_text: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist in under 12 minutes on the Hard difficulty or above.

menu_challenge_bigbank_5_desc.base_text: If they don't know you're there, they won't call the cops. That makes getting the hell out of there a lot less of a hassle.
menu_challenge_bigbank_5_desc.loc_text: If they don't know you're there, they won't call the cops. That makes getting the hell out of there a lot less of a hassle.

menu_challenge_bigbank_5_objective.base_text: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist without triggering the alarm.
menu_challenge_bigbank_5_objective.loc_text: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist without triggering the alarm.

menu_challenge_bob_4_desc.base_text: The Elephant always needs a few extra dollars for his crooked campaigns. Grab all the additional loot in the storage bins in Election Day 2.
menu_challenge_bob_4_desc.loc_text: The Elephant always needs a few extra dollars for his crooked campaigns. Grab all the additional loot in the storage bins in Election Day 2.

menu_challenge_bob_4_objective.base_text: On day 2 of the Election Day job, steal all of the extra loot in the storage bins.
menu_challenge_bob_4_objective.loc_text: On day 2 of the Election Day job, steal all of the extra loot in the storage bins.

menu_challenge_bob_8_desc.base_text: The Dentist has an unusual test for you. He wants to see you use the computers in Election Day (Day 1) without setting off the alarm or touching the ground.
menu_challenge_bob_8_desc.loc_text: The Dentist has an unusual test for you. He wants to see you use the computers in Election Day (Day 1) without setting off the alarm or touching the ground.

menu_challenge_bob_8_objective.base_text: On day 1 of the Election Day job, use the computer in stealth without ever touching the ground.
menu_challenge_bob_8_objective.loc_text: On day 1 of the Election Day job, use the computer in stealth without ever touching the ground.

menu_challenge_born_5_desc.base_text: When Bain wants something, he sometimes wants it fast. This is one of those times. In fact, he wants it faster than usual!
menu_challenge_born_5_desc.loc_text: When Bain wants something, he sometimes wants it fast. This is one of those times. In fact, he wants it faster than usual!

menu_challenge_born_5_objective.base_text: Complete the second day of The Biker Heist job within 120 seconds on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
menu_challenge_born_5_objective.loc_text: Complete the second day of The Biker Heist job within 120 seconds on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

menu_challenge_brb_8_desc.base_text: When you take into account all the planning and work that comes with breaking into a vault, it's a good idea to pull as much gold out of it as possible to make it worthwhile.
menu_challenge_brb_8_desc.loc_text: When you take into account all the planning and work that comes with breaking into a vault, it's a good idea to pull as much gold out of it as possible to make it worthwhile.

menu_challenge_brb_8_objective.base_text: On the Brooklyn Bank Job escape with at least 12 bags of gold on the Very Hard Difficulty or above.
menu_challenge_brb_8_objective.loc_text: On the Brooklyn Bank Job escape with at least 12 bags of gold on the Very Hard Difficulty or above.

menu_challenge_butcher_4_jobs_desc.base_text: The Butcher is desperate for your attention. Finish 4 of The Butcher's jobs on any difficulty.
menu_challenge_butcher_4_jobs_desc.loc_text: The Butcher is desperate for your attention. Finish 4 of The Butcher's jobs on any difficulty.

menu_challenge_cac_12.base_text: I'm Sure No One Heard That
menu_challenge_cac_12.loc_text: I'm Sure No One Heard That

menu_challenge_cac_12_desc.base_text: It's a heister of rare skill that can keep their head cool and get the job done after their presence is revealed and a boatload of Boys in Blue are on their way.
menu_challenge_cac_12_desc.loc_text: It's a heister of rare skill that can keep their head cool and get the job done after their presence is revealed and a boatload of Boys in Blue are on their way.

menu_challenge_cac_12_objective.base_text: On the Ukrainian Job, finish the heist in stealth after triggering the alarm with the metal detectors.
menu_challenge_cac_12_objective.loc_text: On the Ukrainian Job, finish the heist in stealth after triggering the alarm with the metal detectors.

menu_challenge_cac_21_desc.base_text: When there are zombies chompin' for your ass, looting isn't a priority for most. But heisters can't stop themselves when there are safes to be opened...
menu_challenge_cac_21_desc.loc_text: When there are zombies chompin' for your ass, looting isn't a priority for most. But heisters can't stop themselves when there are safes to be opened...

menu_challenge_cac_21_objective.base_text: In the Cursed Kill Room job, open at least 6 safes in a single run on the Very Hard difficulty or above.
menu_challenge_cac_21_objective.loc_text: In the Cursed Kill Room job, open at least 6 safes in a single run on the Very Hard difficulty or above.

menu_challenge_cac_23_desc.base_text: Sometimes, it's OK to indulge in the pure ego-driven satisfaction of showing your enemies just how superior your skills really are. Nothing says "I can aim the shit out of you" like using a bow and arrow against a firearm.
menu_challenge_cac_23_desc.loc_text: Sometimes, it's OK to indulge in the pure ego-driven satisfaction of showing your enemies just how superior your skills really are. Nothing says "I can aim the shit out of you" like using a bow and arrow against a firearm.

menu_challenge_cac_23_objective.base_text: Complete the Undercover job with every crew member using a bow without any modifications and normal arrows on OVERKILL difficulty or above.
menu_challenge_cac_23_objective.loc_text: Complete the Undercover job with every crew member using a bow without any modifications and normal arrows on OVERKILL difficulty or above.

menu_challenge_cane_4_desc.base_text: There's a certain brutal elegance in the versatility of a twelve gauge shotgun, no matter if it's a double or single barreled, one-shot or auto. A crew with uniform equipment takes that elegance to an even higher level.
menu_challenge_cane_4_desc.loc_text: There's a certain brutal elegance in the versatility of a twelve gauge shotgun, no matter if it's a double or single barreled, one-shot or auto. A crew with uniform equipment takes that elegance to an even higher level.

menu_challenge_cane_4_objective.base_text: Complete the Santa's Workshop job having all players in the crew only use shotguns.
menu_challenge_cane_4_objective.loc_text: Complete the Santa's Workshop job having all players in the crew only use shotguns.

menu_challenge_cane_5_desc.base_text: A good heister learns to get by with just the basics. If you can do the job without using any fancy extras, your reward will be that much sweeter.
menu_challenge_cane_5_desc.loc_text: A good heister learns to get by with just the basics. If you can do the job without using any fancy extras, your reward will be that much sweeter.

menu_challenge_cane_5_objective.base_text: In the Santa's Workshop job, secure 10 bags of loot without using any player equipment or assets.

menu_challenge_kosugi_4_objective.loc_text: In the Shadow Raid job, secure all 4 pieces of the samurai armor.

menu_challenge_kosugi_5_desc.base_text: Gage is feeling greedy, but is willing to reward generously. He's asking for sixteen pieces of loot from the Murkywater warehouse in Shadow Raid. Also, he wants all of the samurai armor.

menu_challenge_lab_2_desc.base_text: It's damn hard to cook meth when someone is looking over your shoulder. It's even harder if that person wants to kill you.

menu_challenge_lets_do_this_desc.base_text: Vlad is one crazy motherfucker. He's also an impatient motherfucker. Fetch him that tiara in Ukrainian Job in thirty-five seconds or less.

menu_challenge_lets_do_this_objective.loc_text: In the Ukrainian job, complete the heist within 35 seconds.

menu_challenge_lmg_100_kills_desc.base_text: There are situations that require the deft hand of a cold blade, but this one demands the wild and short bursts of death that come from a high rate of fire.
menu_challenge_lmg_100_kills_desc.loc_text: There are situations that require the deft hand of a cold blade, but this one demands the wild and short bursts of death that come from a high rate of fire.

menu_challenge_lord_of_war_desc.base_text: Gage has been asked to fulfill a large order of weapons, and will pay top dollar for anything we can recover. Secure all of the weapons from the Firestarter (Day 1) airport.

menu_challenge_lord_of_war_objective.loc_text: On day 1 of the Firestarter job, steal all the weapons from the hangar.

menu_challenge_mallcrasher_stealth_desc.base_text: "Hey, it's gonna be just like in that zombie movie... except without all the carnage and blood."

menu_challenge_mallcrasher_stealth_obj.loc_text: Complete the Mallcrasher job in stealth. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.

menu_challenge_melee_100_kills_desc.base_text: If action movies of the 1980s taught us one thing, it's that bullets don't last forever and eventually so have to get in close to take out your enemy.
menu_challenge_melee_100_kills_desc.loc_text: If action movies of the 1980s taught us one thing, it's that bullets don't last forever and eventually so have to get in close to take out your enemy.

menu_challenge_melt_3_desc.base_text: It itches, doesn't it? That feeling of leaving something juicy behind. Don't do it, man. Don't do it.... even if every fiber of your being is telling you to.

menu_challenge_melt_4_desc.base_text: Muscle cars are wonderful. The sound of the V8, the creaking of the leaf spring suspension, the long hood swaying as you round corners. But they're not really good for hauling radiating objects, are they? Unless you fancy the idea of being inside a rolling nuclear oven...

menu_challenge_melt_4_objective.loc_text: In the Meltdown job, complete the heist without using the "Longfellow".

menu_challenge_menu_challenge_farm_1_des.base_text: Imagine the Mall Santa's most-wanted dream... being able to zip-tie up the parents of all those kids that kneed him in the groin on a given day.

menu_challenge_monthly_firestarter_desc.base_text: Nostalgic people prefer to only think about what was good back in the day, easily forgetting the bad days. Like when you're robbing a bank with shoddy weapons and poor armor.

menu_challenge_peta_3_desc.base_text: Let's face it. Goats smell bad, they really do. Hauling a dozen or so of them in a helicopter means you will smell bad too. To spare your fellow heisters a load of agony, head straight to the shower after any goat-hauling shenanigans.

menu_challenge_peta_3_objective.loc_text: Complete the second day of the Goat Simulator heist within 4 minutes from when the escape car is available.

menu_challenge_pig_2_desc.base_text: There are many ways to get fit. Rushing up several flights of stairs dodging a hail of missiles, sniper shots and cops, probably isn't the most healthy. But it's probably effective, in one way or another...

menu_challenge_pig_4_desc.base_text: If you spend all day slaving over a hot bunsen burner and chemicals, what do you really have to show for it? Meth... you got meth.
menu_challenge_pig_4_desc.loc_text: If you spend all day slaving over a hot bunsen burner and chemicals, what do you really have to show for it? Meth... you got meth.

menu_challenge_pig_4_objective.loc_text: Cook and secure six bags of meth on day one of the Hotline Miami job.

menu_challenge_pink_panther_desc.base_text: Art can really pay, and I have a guy who will pay for it. Steal all of the sold paintings in Framing Frame (Day 1). He's antsy, though, so do not be seen.

menu_challenge_pink_panther_objective.loc_text: On day 1 of the Framing Frame job, steal all sold paintings without being seen.

menu_challenge_safehouse_daily_reward.loc_text: Continental Coins to purchase safe house upgrades and weapon mods.

menu_challenge_safehouse_raid_weekly_des.base_text: "There's no place like home. We got trouble comin' to raid our flat and they aren't no bloody wizards."
menu_challenge_safehouse_raid_weekly_des.loc_text: "There's no place like home. We got trouble comin' to raid our flat and they aren't no bloody wizards."

menu_challenge_safehouse_raid_weekly_obj.loc_text: Successfully defend the safehouse in the Safehouse Raid job 3 times. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.

menu_challenge_safehouse_td_desc.base_text: "Never send a micro-wave to guard your front door. Tripwire axes and motion detectors are all dandy but they don't amount to much unless you got proper firepower as well. Let see if we can't upgrade our defences somewhat."

menu_challenge_safehouse_td_obj.loc_text: Complete the Safehouse Raid on OVERKILL or above, with everybody using only Sentry Guns to kill enemies. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.

menu_challenge_sentry_100_kills_obj.loc_text: Kill 100 enemies using heister placed Sentry Guns.

menu_challenge_slakt_2_objective.loc_text: Answer 4 pagers by yourself within 90 seconds from first to last pager.

menu_challenge_slakt_3_objective.loc_text: In the Hoxton Breakout job, complete day 2 without using a single keycard on OVERKILL difficulty or above.

menu_challenge_the_first_line_objective.base_text: On day 3 of the Firestarter job, find the rare hockey poster of the OVERKILL hockey team.
menu_challenge_the_first_line_objective.loc_text: On day 3 of the Firestarter job, find the rare hockey poster of the OVERKILL hockey team.

menu_challenge_the_wire_desc.base_text: The Elephant wants to keep things quiet down at the bureau. Finish Firestarter (Day 2) without setting off the alarm or hacking a computer.
menu_challenge_the_wire_desc.loc_text: The Elephant wants to keep things quiet down at the bureau. Finish Firestarter (Day 2) without setting off the alarm or hacking a computer.

menu_challenge_the_wire_objective.base_text: On day 2 of the Firestarter job, complete the heist in stealth without hacking the computer.
menu_challenge_the_wire_objective.loc_text: On day 2 of the Firestarter job, complete the heist in stealth without hacking the computer.

menu_challenge_trophy_reward.base_text: Continental Coins and a Safe House Trophy
menu_challenge_trophy_reward.loc_text: Continental Coins and a Safe House Trophy

menu_challenge_vlad_4_jobs_desc.base_text: Vlad is desperate for your attention. Finish 4 of Vlad's jobs on any difficulty.
menu_challenge_vlad_4_jobs_desc.loc_text: Vlad is desperate for your attention. Finish 4 of Vlad's jobs on any difficulty.

menu_challenge_voff_1_objective.base_text: Complete the Bank Heist job after finding the 2 punks in the parking lot and bringing them next to the van, without letting them get away or die on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
menu_challenge_voff_1_objective.loc_text: Complete the Bank Heist job after finding the 2 punks in the parking lot and bringing them next to the van, without letting them get away or die on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

menu_challenge_voff_2_objective.base_text: In the The Bomb: Dockyard job, cook 2 bags of meth and secure them.
menu_challenge_voff_2_objective.loc_text: In the The Bomb: Dockyard job, cook 2 bags of meth and secure them.

menu_challenge_voff_3_desc.base_text: Jimmy is all high on blow and has his mind set on "glorifious swagger stuff" as he screams in a drug frenzy without a seeming end. Murky Station is full of loot. So get it, get out and don't kill anyone.
menu_challenge_voff_3_desc.loc_text: Jimmy is all high on blow and has his mind set on "glorifious swagger stuff" as he screams in a drug frenzy without a seeming end. Murky Station is full of loot. So get it, get out and don't kill anyone.

menu_challenge_voff_3_objective.base_text: Complete the Murky Station job by finding and securing all loot without killing anyone on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
menu_challenge_voff_3_objective.loc_text: Complete the Murky Station job by finding and securing all loot without killing anyone on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

menu_challenge_voff_4_desc.base_text: One does not simply board a plane, kill the hostiles, stay alive and manage to find the nine rings given to kings from all the corners of the world. But worth trying.
menu_challenge_voff_4_desc.loc_text: One does not simply board a plane, kill the hostiles, stay alive and manage to find the nine rings given to kings from all the corners of the world. But worth trying.

menu_challenge_voff_4_objective.base_text: In the Birth of Sky job, find all 9 rings.
menu_challenge_voff_4_objective.loc_text: In the Birth of Sky job, find all 9 rings.

menu_challenge_voff_5_objective.base_text: In the Cook Off job, cook 25 bags of meth on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
menu_challenge_voff_5_objective.loc_text: In the Cook Off job, cook 25 bags of meth on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

menu_challenge_winters_mutated_desc.base_text: It's not often we get a singular nemesis to overcome, so when we do, it could almost be thought of as a blessing.
menu_challenge_winters_mutated_desc.loc_text: It's not often we get a singular nemesis to overcome, so when we do, it could almost be thought of as a blessing.

menu_challenge_winters_mutated_obj.base_text: Defeat Captain Winters while on any job, while the Hydra mutator is active.
menu_challenge_winters_mutated_obj.loc_text: Defeat Captain Winters while on any job, while the Hydra mutator is active.

menu_challenge_xmas_all_desc.base_text: I'm dreaming of a Christmas where the cops all drink some bad eggnog and stay out of our way for a change.
menu_challenge_xmas_all_desc.loc_text: I'm dreaming of a Christmas where the cops all drink some bad eggnog and stay out of our way for a change.

menu_challenge_xmas_all_obj.base_text: Complete the White Xmas, Santa's Workshop, and Stealing Xmas jobs. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.
menu_challenge_xmas_all_obj.loc_text: Complete the White Xmas, Santa's Workshop, and Stealing Xmas jobs. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.

menu_challenge_xmas_walking_nightmare_de.base_text: "So, last night I had this dream about a skeleton in a Santa suit. But when he took it off, it wasn't a skeleton, but a King Cloaker. No idea how that's supposed to work. Dreams are some weird-ass shit."
menu_challenge_xmas_walking_nightmare_de.loc_text: "So, last night I had this dream about a skeleton in a Santa suit. But when he took it off, it wasn't a skeleton, but a King Cloaker. No idea how that's supposed to work. Dreams are some weird-ass shit."

menu_challenge_xmas_walking_nightmare_ob.base_text: While the Waking Nightmare mutator is active, complete any of the White Xmas, Santa's Workshop, or Stealing Xmas jobs. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.
menu_challenge_xmas_walking_nightmare_ob.loc_text: While the Waking Nightmare mutator is active, complete any of the White Xmas, Santa's Workshop, or Stealing Xmas jobs. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.

menu_challenge_yeah_hes_a_gold_digger_de.base_text: To help protect against counterfeiters, Vlad needs an ingot of pure gold to measure its precise weight. We have heard that a manager at Four Stores has one in a safe.
menu_challenge_yeah_hes_a_gold_digger_de.loc_text: To help protect against counterfeiters, Vlad needs an ingot of pure gold to measure its precise weight. We have heard that a manager at Four Stores has one in a safe.

menu_challenge_yeah_hes_a_gold_digger_ob.base_text: In the Four Stores job, find a gold bar in a safe.
menu_challenge_yeah_hes_a_gold_digger_ob.loc_text: In the Four Stores job, find a gold bar in a safe.

menu_challenge_you_shall_not_pass_desc.base_text: Send a message to the cops that we fight for our territory. Don't let a single cop set foot on the bridge before you escape.
menu_challenge_you_shall_not_pass_desc.loc_text: Send a message to the cops that we fight for our territory. Don't let a single cop set foot on the bridge before you escape.

menu_challenge_you_shall_not_pass_object.base_text: In the Overpass escape, don't let the cops set foot on the bridge before you can escape.
menu_challenge_you_shall_not_pass_object.loc_text: In the Overpass escape, don't let the cops set foot on the bridge before you can escape.

menu_chico_desc_codex.base_text: They don't make 'em like Tony anymore. A fast talker who knows what he wants and how to get it. He's the real deal when the shit hits the fan, a true-born heister. He doesn't back down for anyone and he dishes it out just as hard as he can take it. This guys got balls.

menu_clover_desc_codex.base_text: Clover grew up in a rough house in a rough part of town. Her ancestors were fighters in every generation, and she is fiercely dedicated to her Irish heritage. She wears the clovers for luck, as well as a way to say "I'm Irish, and I'm proud".

menu_cs_basement_desc.base_text: In the basement John Wick is setting up a shooting range, with Wolf's workshop right next door. At the other end, Sokol and Dragan have their gym and training facilities. Bodhi has set up a workshop for his surfboards, too. And then there's Jacket's corner.$NL;$NL;The basement is also home to the vault, where the gang keeps all that sweet loot.

menu_cs_daily_desc.base_text: Every day a heister in the safe house will have a challenge for you! Meet with them in the safe house to accept their challenge, and then go out into the world to complete the requirements. Complete the challenge, and they'll give you a few Continental Coins for your troubles.$NL;$NL;Wick managed to get the Payday crew membership to The Continental, so they're giving you coins for every heist you pull off. With enough coins, Charlie and his boys will come in and do a little redecorating for us, and make sure that any work done stays off the books.

Meet with them in the safe house to accept their challenge, and then go out into the world to complete the requirements. Complete the challenge, and they'll give you a few Continental Coins for your troubles.$NL;$NL;Wick managed to get the Payday crew membership to The Continental, so they're giving you coins for every heist you pull off. With enough coins, Charlie and his boys will come in and do a little redecorating for us, and make sure that any work done stays off the books.

menu_cs_ground_floor_desc.base_text: The ground floor is where the main hall and lounge is. Bonnie is getting installed nicely with her own gambling den, right next to Jiro's corner lounge. And Jimmy's at the bar, of course.$NL;$NL;Out in the garage, Houston and Rust are both working on their own projects. Sydney has set up a mask painting studio there as well.
menu_cs_ground_floor_desc.loc_text: The ground floor is where the main hall and lounge is. Bonnie is getting installed nicely with her own gambling den, right next to Jiro's corner lounge. And Jimmy's at the bar, of course.$NL;$NL;Out in the garage, Houston and Rust are both working on their own projects. Sydney has set up a mask painting studio there as well.

menu_cs_help_bodhi_1.base_text: Bodhi hunts the waves as much as the next challenge. Building surfboards helps him meditate and prepare for the ordeals of the Ozaki 8.
menu_cs_help_bodhi_1.loc_text: Bodhi hunts the waves as much as the next challenge. Building surfboards helps him meditate and prepare for the ordeals of the Ozaki 8.

menu_cs_help_bodhi_2.base_text: Bodhi's love for the waves shows in the creation of his boards. The mental preparation reaches one step further for each board he completes.
menu_cs_help_bodhi_2.loc_text: Bodhi's love for the waves shows in the creation of his boards. The mental preparation reaches one step further for each board he completes.

menu_cs_help_bodhi_3.base_text: Perfecting the creation of a surfboard has brought Bodhi to the state of mind he needs to be. He is now ready for the challenges that lies ahead.
menu_cs_help_bodhi_3.loc_text: Perfecting the creation of a surfboard has brought Bodhi to the state of mind he needs to be. He is now ready for the challenges that lies ahead.

menu_cs_help_bonnie_1.base_text: This is where Bonnie is planning to set up her own little gambling den. There's no guarantee she'll find people to play with, though.
menu_cs_help_bonnie_1.loc_text: This is where Bonnie is planning to set up her own little gambling den. There's no guarantee she'll find people to play with, though.

menu_cs_help_bonnie_2.base_text: With a nice big slot machine, Bonnie is starting to feel right at home here.
menu_cs_help_bonnie_2.loc_text: With a nice big slot machine, Bonnie is starting to feel right at home here.

menu_cs_help_bonnie_3.base_text: Bonnie's got her corner sorted the way she likes it now. She's even got her own roulette with an actual croupier.
menu_cs_help_bonnie_3.loc_text: Bonnie's got her corner sorted the way she likes it now. She's even got her own roulette with an actual croupier.

menu_cs_help_chains_1.base_text: Chains' room where he tinkers with the gang's weapons and his own pet projects.
menu_cs_help_chains_1.loc_text: Chains' room where he tinkers with the gang's weapons and his own pet projects.

menu_cs_help_chains_2.base_text: Chains now has room for more weapons, and better lighting to work with. Great things will happen here.
menu_cs_help_chains_2.loc_text: Chains now has room for more weapons, and better lighting to work with. Great things will happen here.

menu_cs_help_chains_3.base_text: This is the perfect armory - excellent for storing and maintaining an arsenal to take on the entire Washington area police force.
menu_cs_help_chains_3.loc_text: This is the perfect armory - excellent for storing and maintaining an arsenal to take on the entire Washington area police force.

menu_cs_help_clover_1.base_text: Clover is trying to set up a security system to protect the house from raids and infiltration. She will put the "safe" in Safe House.
menu_cs_help_clover_1.loc_text: Clover is trying to set up a security system to protect the house from raids and infiltration. She will put the "safe" in Safe House.

menu_cs_help_clover_2.base_text: Clover has got some proper computers in here now. The security system has finally left the stone age, she says.
menu_cs_help_clover_2.loc_text: Clover has got some proper computers in here now. The security system has finally left the stone age, she says.

menu_cs_help_clover_3.base_text: The house is now like a fortress. There are cameras everywhere - you can't even go to the bathroom without Clover registering it.
menu_cs_help_clover_3.loc_text: The house is now like a fortress. There are cameras everywhere - you can't even go to the bathroom without Clover registering it.

menu_cs_help_common_room_1.base_text: Kitchen, bathrooms, a big lounge... the common areas that everyone uses.
menu_cs_help_common_room_1.loc_text: Kitchen, bathrooms, a big lounge... the common areas that everyone uses.

menu_cs_help_common_room_2.base_text: Better facilities and a much nicer lounge. This is beginning to look really good.
menu_cs_help_common_room_2.loc_text: Better facilities and a much nicer lounge. This is beginning to look really good.

menu_cs_help_common_room_3.base_text: Fancy bathrooms, a luxurious lounge and a swanky kitchen that's looking better than ever. Guests will be impressed.
menu_cs_help_common_room_3.loc_text: Fancy bathrooms, a luxurious lounge and a swanky kitchen that's looking better than ever. Guests will be impressed.

menu_cs_help_dallas_1.base_text: Dallas' corner where he plans out new heists and keeps tabs on the outside world. Here he can easily access Side Jobs and Crime.Net
menu_cs_help_dallas_1.loc_text: Dallas' corner where he plans out new heists and keeps tabs on the outside world. Here he can easily access Side Jobs and Crime.Net

menu_cs_help_dallas_2.base_text: A more comfortable space with a small TV set. Dallas is starting to feel that this may yet become a worthy HQ for the Payday Gang.
menu_cs_help_dallas_2.loc_text: A more comfortable space with a small TV set. Dallas is starting to feel that this may yet become a worthy HQ for the Payday Gang.

menu_cs_help_dallas_3.base_text: This is now the perfect office for Dallas, where he has everything he needs to calmly sit down and plan the details of upcoming heists.
menu_cs_help_dallas_3.loc_text: This is now the perfect office for Dallas, where he has everything he needs to calmly sit down and plan the details of upcoming heists.

menu_cs_help_dragan_1.base_text: Dragan took a look in the mirror when Chains wasn't looking. He will keep himself and the rest of the gang in shape from now on, no matter what, and is building a gym to do it.
menu_cs_help_dragan_1.loc_text: Dragan took a look in the mirror when Chains wasn't looking. He will keep himself and the rest of the gang in shape from now on, no matter what, and is building a gym to do it.

menu_cs_help_dragan_2.base_text: More equipment, better muscles. Old and grey maybe but never fat, Dragan says.
menu_cs_help_dragan_2.loc_text: More equipment, better muscles. Old and grey maybe but never fat, Dragan says.

menu_cs_help_dragan_3.base_text: A proper gym, and a punching bag for trying out all of the gang's melee weapons. This is the kind of stuff that Dragan likes. Come and play.
menu_cs_help_dragan_3.loc_text: A proper gym, and a punching bag for trying out all of the gang's melee weapons. This is the kind of stuff that Dragan likes. Come and play.

menu_cs_help_dragon_1.base_text: Jiro's corner, where he likes to relax and meditate between heists.
menu_cs_help_dragon_1.loc_text: Jiro's corner, where he likes to relax and meditate between heists.

menu_cs_help_dragon_2.base_text: A sandsteel Katana really sharpens the look of this room.
menu_cs_help_dragon_2.loc_text: A sandsteel Katana really sharpens the look of this room.

menu_cs_help_dragon_3.base_text: Japan still lives in Jiro's heart and also in his corner of the Safe House. A couple of loyal friends from Jiro's old days joins him out of debt and respect.
menu_cs_help_dragon_3.loc_text: Japan still lives in Jiro's heart and also in his corner of the Safe House. A couple of loyal friends from Jiro's old days joins him out of debt and respect.

menu_cs_help_ecp_1.base_text: As avid vloggers and streamers Ethan and Hila need space for their videos and they started setting up in the common rooms with total disregard to Aldstone complaints.
menu_cs_help_ecp_1.loc_text: As avid vloggers and streamers Ethan and Hila need space for their videos and they started setting up in the common rooms with total disregard to Aldstone complaints.

menu_cs_help_ecp_2.base_text: Ethan and Hila has started to set up their gear and getting settled in on their new set. Even if they sometimes get in the way of the other heisters they need the space to express themselves.
menu_cs_help_ecp_2.loc_text: Ethan and Hila has started to set up their gear and getting settled in on their new set. Even if they sometimes get in the way of the other heisters they need the space to express themselves.

menu_cs_help_ecp_3.base_text: With proper lights and set up they can finally be fully creative in their new recording area. With everything set up now, it feels like they spend nearly as much time in front of the camera as heisting.
menu_cs_help_ecp_3.loc_text: With proper lights and set up they can finally be fully creative in their new recording area. With everything set up now, it feels like they spend nearly as much time in front of the camera as heisting.

menu_cs_help_houston_1.base_text: Houston is in charge of the escape van and tuning the gang's cars. He can switch out the color of the escape van whenever the gang needs it.
menu_cs_help_houston_1.loc_text: Houston is in charge of the escape van and tuning the gang's cars. He can switch out the color of the escape van whenever the gang needs it.

menu_cs_help_houston_2.base_text: The garage is being upgraded, and with it the old car is coming together. Houston is giving it a new life, and in return it gives him peace of mind.
menu_cs_help_houston_2.loc_text: The garage is being upgraded, and with it the old car is coming together. Houston is giving it a new life, and in return it gives him peace of mind.

menu_cs_help_houston_3.base_text: A perfect garage with a perfect car in it. And a morally flawed but technically proficient mechanic.
menu_cs_help_houston_3.loc_text: A perfect garage with a perfect car in it. And a morally flawed but technically proficient mechanic.

menu_cs_help_hoxton_1.base_text: Hoxton is trying to get the gang's papers and files organized. It's all a mess but he still keeps tabs on the FBI's files from here.
menu_cs_help_hoxton_1.loc_text: Hoxton is trying to get the gang's papers and files organized. It's all a mess but he still keeps tabs on the FBI's files from here.

menu_cs_help_hoxton_2.base_text: Things in the office are getting better organized. Files and papers are in their places, mostly. He is clearly still looking for the traitor.
menu_cs_help_hoxton_2.loc_text: Things in the office are getting better organized. Files and papers are in their places, mostly. He is clearly still looking for the traitor.

menu_cs_help_hoxton_3.base_text: A tidy and neat office, with everything in its place. Hoxton did this, would you believe it. Aldstone taught him well.
menu_cs_help_hoxton_3.loc_text: A tidy and neat office, with everything in its place. Hoxton did this, would you believe it. Aldstone taught him well.

menu_cs_help_jacket_1.base_text: Jacket doesn't have high requirements for comfort. An old couch and some hardware to mix tapes with is quite enough.
menu_cs_help_jacket_1.loc_text: Jacket doesn't have high requirements for comfort. An old couch and some hardware to mix tapes with is quite enough.

menu_cs_help_jacket_2.base_text: A TV is essential for any den of a mute crazy person.
menu_cs_help_jacket_2.loc_text: A TV is essential for any den of a mute crazy person.

menu_cs_help_jacket_3.base_text: An old arcade for Jacket. He's got no reason to ever leave this room now. Dream come true.
menu_cs_help_jacket_3.loc_text: An old arcade for Jacket. He's got no reason to ever leave this room now. Dream come true.

menu_cs_help_jimmy_1.base_text: Yes, Jimmy's at the bar. Where else would he be?
menu_cs_help_jimmy_1.loc_text: Yes, Jimmy's at the bar. Where else would he be?

menu_cs_help_jimmy_2.base_text: The bar is now much more well stocked, and Jimmy is working hard at emptying it as fast as Aldstone can fill it up.
menu_cs_help_jimmy_2.loc_text: The bar is now much more well stocked, and Jimmy is working hard at emptying it as fast as Aldstone can fill it up.

menu_cs_help_jimmy_3.base_text: The bar has been extended, and Aldstone has managed to find a permanent bartender. Apparently, putting up with Jimmy is nothing compared to his old workplace.
menu_cs_help_jimmy_3.loc_text: The bar has been extended, and Aldstone has managed to find a permanent bartender. Apparently, putting up with Jimmy is nothing compared to his old workplace.

menu_cs_help_jowi_1.base_text: Wick has got some big plans and got the biggest space to make it happen.
menu_cs_help_jowi_1.loc_text: Wick has got some big plans and got the biggest space to make it happen.

menu_cs_help_jowi_2.base_text: A new shooting range, it's time for honing skills and preparing for the next mission. Wick will not go down for lack of training.
menu_cs_help_jowi_2.loc_text: A new shooting range, it's time for honing skills and preparing for the next mission. Wick will not go down for lack of training.

menu_cs_help_jowi_3.base_text: The best shot needs to also hit their mark on the move. John builds a Killhouse where he holds the record and gives advice to those who need it.
menu_cs_help_jowi_3.loc_text: The best shot needs to also hit their mark on the move. John builds a Killhouse where he holds the record and gives advice to those who need it.

menu_cs_help_joy_1.base_text: A reward from Locke for several jobs well done, 'acquired' from a TV station on the east coast.  It's not much to look at yet, but with some t-l-c, this van can become a hackers paradise.
menu_cs_help_joy_1.loc_text: A reward from Locke for several jobs well done, 'acquired' from a TV station on the east coast.  It's not much to look at yet, but with some t-l-c, this van can become a hackers paradise.

menu_cs_help_joy_2.base_text: The first thing to do is make sure you have enough screens. A hacker can never have too many monitors. A snazzy bench to relax on after hacking all those politicians' e-mails, would be nice too.
menu_cs_help_joy_2.loc_text: The first thing to do is make sure you have enough screens. A hacker can never have too many monitors. A snazzy bench to relax on after hacking all those politicians' e-mails, would be nice too.

menu_cs_help_joy_3.base_text: All work and no play would make Joy go on a rampage. Time to upgrade to a mobile gaming station with every current video game platform (and some not-so-current). A fresh paint job can't hurt either.
menu_cs_help_joy_3.loc_text: All work and no play would make Joy go on a rampage. Time to upgrade to a mobile gaming station with every current video game platform (and some not-so-current). A fresh paint job can't hurt either.

menu_cs_help_max_1.base_text: Sangres has installed himself here. He's got beer and a couch and an enormous Mexican flag - what else do you need in life?
menu_cs_help_max_1.loc_text: Sangres has installed himself here. He's got beer and a couch and an enormous Mexican flag - what else do you need in life?

menu_cs_help_max_2.base_text: Sangres has a more comfortable room now, with better quality kit and more beer.
menu_cs_help_max_2.loc_text: Sangres has a more comfortable room now, with better quality kit and more beer.

menu_cs_help_max_3.base_text: This is Sangres' cozy den, his cave, his castle. It's perfect. And there's tequila.
menu_cs_help_max_3.loc_text: This is Sangres' cozy den, his cave, his castle. It's perfect. And there's tequila.

menu_cs_help_myh_1.base_text: Duke has found the perfect spot for himself in the safe house- the loft on the second floor. It's a room with a view. Also, privacy!
menu_cs_help_myh_1.loc_text: Duke has found the perfect spot for himself in the safe house- the loft on the second floor. It's a room with a view. Also, privacy!

menu_cs_help_myh_2.base_text: Research papers, paintings, artefacts of ancient, mysterious origin (and of course, value) have begun arriving. It's everything Duke needs to lose himself in mythology, history and his search for that next big thing to steal.
menu_cs_help_myh_2.loc_text: Research papers, paintings, artefacts of ancient, mysterious origin (and of course, value) have begun arriving. It's everything Duke needs to lose himself in mythology, history and his search for that next big thing to steal.

menu_cs_help_myh_3.base_text: To others, uneven stacks of books, piles of paper and assorted antique knick-nacks lying about in chaotic disarray are nothing but a useless mess, but to Duke, each item contains clues to a wonderful puzzle that must be solved.
menu_cs_help_myh_3.loc_text: To others, uneven stacks of books, piles of paper and assorted antique knick-nacks lying about in chaotic disarray are nothing but a useless mess, but to Duke, each item contains clues to a wonderful puzzle that must be solved.

menu_cs_help_rust_1.base_text: Rust always felt right at home in a garage and that will never change.
menu_cs_help_rust_1.loc_text: Rust always felt right at home in a garage and that will never change.

menu_cs_help_rust_2.base_text: Better tools, more beer. Rust is an easy man to please if you do it right.
menu_cs_help_rust_2.loc_text: Better tools, more beer. Rust is an easy man to please if you do it right.

menu_cs_help_rust_3.base_text: Rust got all of his tools unpacked and can finally brood in his corner in peace.
menu_cs_help_rust_3.loc_text: Rust got all of his tools unpacked and can finally brood in his corner in peace.

menu_cs_help_sokol_1.base_text: Sokol's setting up a hockey gym to keep his slapshot skills tuned.
menu_cs_help_sokol_1.loc_text: Sokol's setting up a hockey gym to keep his slapshot skills tuned.

menu_cs_help_sokol_2.base_text: This will soon start looking like a real fake hockey rink.
menu_cs_help_sokol_2.loc_text: This will soon start looking like a real fake hockey rink.

menu_cs_help_sokol_3.base_text: This is like a small temple to ice hockey now. Makes Sokol feel right at home. Nobody has beat his high score, yet.
menu_cs_help_sokol_3.loc_text: This is like a small temple to ice hockey now. Makes Sokol feel right at home. Nobody has beat his high score, yet.

menu_cs_help_sydney_1.base_text: Sydney's got a mask painting studio set up in the garage and set up a computer to easily browse different skin designs for the gang's weapons.
menu_cs_help_sydney_1.loc_text: Sydney's got a mask painting studio set up in the garage and set up a computer to easily browse different skin designs for the gang's weapons.

menu_cs_help_sydney_2.base_text: With better tools and materials, Sydney's got a much nicer workspace and can put up more masks for display.
menu_cs_help_sydney_2.loc_text: With better tools and materials, Sydney's got a much nicer workspace and can put up more masks for display.

menu_cs_help_sydney_3.base_text: If an artist workspace doesn't feel complete, the work in it never will too. The fanciest mask creation studio in Washington right here.
menu_cs_help_sydney_3.loc_text: If an artist workspace doesn't feel complete, the work in it never will too. The fanciest mask creation studio in Washington right here.

menu_cs_help_terry_1.base_text: Scarface is getting himself installed next to the kitchen. He just wishes the house had a nicer staircase.
menu_cs_help_terry_1.loc_text: Scarface is getting himself installed next to the kitchen. He just wishes the house had a nicer staircase.

menu_cs_help_terry_2.base_text: Scarface is used to living in style, so he's collecting assorted pieces of art to fix his room up. He's got a nice rug, too.
menu_cs_help_terry_2.loc_text: Scarface is used to living in style, so he's collecting assorted pieces of art to fix his room up. He's got a nice rug, too.

menu_cs_help_terry_3.base_text: Piano, check. Tiger skin, check. Welcome to Scarfaces place. Can you smell the money now? Or the coke?
menu_cs_help_terry_3.loc_text: Piano, check. Tiger skin, check. Welcome to Scarfaces place. Can you smell the money now? Or the coke?

menu_cs_help_vault_1.base_text: The old vault was too small to fit the gang's big ambitions.
menu_cs_help_vault_1.loc_text: The old vault was too small to fit the gang's big ambitions.

menu_cs_help_vault_2.base_text: Bigger and fancier is better. The gang's ill-gotten gains needs to be secure.
menu_cs_help_vault_2.loc_text: Bigger and fancier is better. The gang's ill-gotten gains needs to be secure.

menu_cs_help_vault_3.base_text: A vault worthy of a major bank. Or of those who repeatedly rob major banks.
menu_cs_help_vault_3.loc_text: A vault worthy of a major bank. Or of those who repeatedly rob major banks.

menu_cs_help_wolf_1.base_text: This is where Wolf designs and builds new equipment that can give the gang an edge on the heists.
menu_cs_help_wolf_1.loc_text: This is where Wolf designs and builds new equipment that can give the gang an edge on the heists.

menu_cs_help_wolf_2.base_text: A better workbench and more tools have been acquired. Same old insane ideas, though. This could go somewhere.
menu_cs_help_wolf_2.loc_text: A better workbench and more tools have been acquired. Same old insane ideas, though. This could go somewhere.

menu_cs_help_wolf_3.base_text: This is getting dangerously close to the perfect synergy of the brilliant engineer with an excellent workspace. Beware, world.
menu_cs_help_wolf_3.loc_text: This is getting dangerously close to the perfect synergy of the brilliant engineer with an excellent workspace. Beware, world.

menu_cs_host_failed_text.base_text: The host has failed their Crime Spree and must choose to continue.
menu_cs_host_failed_text.loc_text: The host has failed their Crime Spree and must choose to continue.

menu_cs_in_progress_desc_higher.base_text: Your Crime Spree Rank is higher than the host of this Crime Spree. You will not gain any rewards until the host's Crime Spree Rank matches or is greater than yours.
menu_cs_in_progress_desc_higher.loc_text: Your Crime Spree Rank is higher than the host of this Crime Spree. You will not gain any rewards until the host's Crime Spree Rank matches or is greater than yours.

menu_cs_modifier_assault_extender.base_text: Police Assaults will have a $duration;% longer duration. This gets reduced by $deduction;% for every hostage and converted cop - up to a maximum of $max_hostages;
menu_cs_modifier_assault_extender.loc_text: Police Assaults will have a $duration;% longer duration. This gets reduced by $deduction;% for every hostage and converted cop - up to a maximum of $max_hostages;

menu_cs_modifier_civs.base_text: The alarm will be sounded if more than $count; civilians are killed.
menu_cs_modifier_civs.loc_text: The alarm will be sounded if more than $count; civilians are killed.

menu_cs_modifier_cloaker_arrest.base_text: Cloakers executing a successful charge now cuffs the player instead of downing them.
menu_cs_modifier_cloaker_arrest.loc_text: Cloakers executing a successful charge now cuffs the player instead of downing them.

menu_cs_modifier_cloaker_smoke.base_text: Cloakers will drop a smokebomb when they kick a player.
menu_cs_modifier_cloaker_smoke.loc_text: Cloakers will drop a smokebomb when they kick a player.

menu_cs_modifier_cloaker_tear_gas.base_text: Killed Cloakers will instantly drop a tear gas grenade. The tear gas has a duration of $duration; seconds, covers a $diameter; meter diameter area and deals $damage; damage per second to any heister who stands in it.
menu_cs_modifier_cloaker_tear_gas.loc_text: Killed Cloakers will instantly drop a tear gas grenade. The tear gas has a duration of $duration; seconds, covers a $diameter; meter diameter area and deals $damage; damage per second to any heister who stands in it.

menu_cs_modifier_concealment.base_text: The minimum concealment level is increased by $conceal; in stealth.
menu_cs_modifier_concealment.loc_text: The minimum concealment level is increased by $conceal; in stealth.

menu_cs_modifier_dozer_immune.base_text: Bulldozers are immune to explosive damage.
menu_cs_modifier_dozer_immune.loc_text: Bulldozers are immune to explosive damage.

menu_cs_modifier_dozer_medic.base_text: Whenever a Bulldozer spawns, there is a chance that it will be a Medic Bulldozer. A Medic Bulldozer counts as both a Medic and a Bulldozer.
menu_cs_modifier_dozer_medic.loc_text: Whenever a Bulldozer spawns, there is a chance that it will be a Medic Bulldozer. A Medic Bulldozer counts as both a Medic and a Bulldozer.

menu_cs_modifier_dozer_minigun.base_text: Whenever a Bulldozer spawns, there is a chance that it will be a slow-moving minigun-wielding Bulldozer.
menu_cs_modifier_dozer_minigun.loc_text: Whenever a Bulldozer spawns, there is a chance that it will be a slow-moving minigun-wielding Bulldozer.

menu_cs_modifier_dozer_rage.base_text: When a Bulldozer's face plate is destroyed, the Bulldozer enters a berserker rage, receiving a $damage;% increase to their base damage output.
menu_cs_modifier_dozer_rage.loc_text: When a Bulldozer's face plate is destroyed, the Bulldozer enters a berserker rage, receiving a $damage;% increase to their base damage output.

menu_cs_modifier_dozers.base_text: Two additional Bulldozers are allowed into the level.
menu_cs_modifier_dozers.loc_text: Two additional Bulldozers are allowed into the level.

menu_cs_modifier_enemy_damage.base_text: Enemies deal an additional $damage;% more damage.
menu_cs_modifier_enemy_damage.loc_text: Enemies deal an additional $damage;% more damage.

menu_cs_modifier_enemy_health.base_text: Enemies have an additional $health;% more health.
menu_cs_modifier_enemy_health.loc_text: Enemies have an additional $health;% more health.

menu_cs_modifier_enemy_health_damage.base_text: Enemies have an additional $health;% more health and deal an additional $damage;% more damage.
menu_cs_modifier_enemy_health_damage.loc_text: Enemies have an additional $health;% more health and deal an additional $damage;% more damage.

menu_cs_modifier_heavies.base_text: All FBI Swats will be replaced with Heavy Swats.
menu_cs_modifier_heavies.loc_text: All FBI Swats will be replaced with Heavy Swats.

menu_cs_modifier_heavy_sniper.base_text: For every Heavy SWAT that spawns, there is a chance that it will be replaced by a ZEAL Heavy SWAT Marksman.
menu_cs_modifier_heavy_sniper.loc_text: For every Heavy SWAT that spawns, there is a chance that it will be replaced by a ZEAL Heavy SWAT Marksman.

menu_cs_modifier_medic_adrenaline.base_text: Whenever a Medic revives another cop, the revived cop gets a $damage;% increase to their base damage output.
menu_cs_modifier_medic_adrenaline.loc_text: Whenever a Medic revives another cop, the revived cop gets a $damage;% increase to their base damage output.

menu_cs_modifier_medic_deathwish.base_text: Whenever a Medic is killed, all cops within the Medic's healing range are instantly healed.
menu_cs_modifier_medic_deathwish.loc_text: Whenever a Medic is killed, all cops within the Medic's healing range are instantly healed.

menu_cs_modifier_medic_rage.base_text: For every cop that dies within a Medic's healing range, that Medic sees his base damage output increased by $damage;%. This effect stacks indefinitely.
menu_cs_modifier_medic_rage.loc_text: For every cop that dies within a Medic's healing range, that Medic sees his base damage output increased by $damage;%. This effect stacks indefinitely.

menu_cs_modifier_medics.base_text: Two additional Medics are allowed into the level.

The Pocket ECM Device replaces your current throwable, it can be switched out if desired.$NL;While in game you can use the throwable key to activate the Pocket ECM Device.$NL;$NL;Activating the Pocket ECM Device before the alarm is raised will trigger the jamming effect, disabling all electronics and pagers for a ##$multiperk;## second duration.$NL;$NL;Activating the Pocket ECM Device after the alarm is raised will trigger the feedback effect, granting a chance to stun enemies on the map every second for a ##$multiperk;## second duration.$NL;$NL;The Pocket ECM Device has ##$multiperk2;## charges with a ##$multiperk3;## second cooldown timer, but each kill you perform will shorten the cooldown time by ##$multiperk4;## seconds.

menu_defense_up_beta_desc.base_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;The cost of deploying a sentry gun is reduced by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Your sentry guns gain a protective shield.
menu_defense_up_beta_desc.loc_text: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;The cost of deploying a sentry gun is reduced by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;Your sentry guns gain a protective shield.

menu_dialog_become_infamous.base_text: Becoming Infamous will cost $200,000,000 which will be deducted from your offshore account. If you proceed, your reputation level will be reset to level 0. All your skills and unspent skill points will be removed, and all your spending cash will be burned. The cash on your offshore account however will remain.$NL;$NL;You will start over with no skills and your spending cash will be reset. This is not reversible, and you CAN NOT get back what you sacrifice.$NL;$NL;You get to keep all your guns, mods, masks, patterns and materials. You will also gain one level of Infamy and one Infamy point to spend in the Infamy tree.
menu_dialog_become_infamous.loc_text: Becoming Infamous will cost $200,000,000 which will be deducted from your offshore account. If you proceed, your reputation level will be reset to level 0. All your skills and unspent skill points will be removed, and all your spending cash will be burned. The cash on your offshore account however will remain.$NL;$NL;You will start over with no skills and your spending cash will be reset. This is not reversible, and you CAN NOT get back what you sacrifice.$NL;$NL;You get to keep all your guns, mods, masks, patterns and materials. You will also gain one level of Infamy and one Infamy point to spend in the Infamy tree.

menu_dialog_become_infamous_3_above_5.base_text: If you proceed, your reputation level will be reset to level 0. Your first skill set will be reset, and all other skill sets will be suspended until you have enough points to use them again or you choose to reset them. All profiles will be assigned to use the reset skill set. If you have a weapon equipped that is level locked to 1 or higher it will be replaced with a weapon without a level lock. If no such weapon is available you will be given an AMCAR and/or a Chimano 88. Your profiles will keep assigned masks, outfits and perk deck.$NL;$NL;This is irreversible, and you CAN NOT get back what you sacrifice.$NL;$NL;You get to keep all your guns, mods, masks, patterns and materials. The cash in your offshore account will remain. You will gain one level of Infamy, if you are at infamy level 100 or below you will also get an Infamy reward.
menu_dialog_become_infamous_3_above_5.loc_text: If you proceed, your reputation level will be reset to level 0. Your first skill set will be reset, and all other skill sets will be suspended until you have enough points to use them again or you choose to reset them. All profiles will be assigned to use the reset skill set. If you have a weapon equipped that is level locked to 1 or higher it will be replaced with a weapon without a level lock. If no such weapon is available you will be given an AMCAR and/or a Chimano 88. Your profiles will keep assigned masks, outfits and perk deck.$NL;$NL;This is irreversible, and you CAN NOT get back what you sacrifice.$NL;$NL;You get to keep all your guns, mods, masks, patterns and materials. The cash in your offshore account will remain. You will gain one level of Infamy, if you are at infamy level 100 or below you will also get an Infamy reward.

menu_dialog_become_infamous_no_cash.base_text: You need $cash; from your offshore account to become infamous.
menu_dialog_become_infamous_no_cash.loc_text: You need $cash; from your offshore account to become infamous.

menu_dire_need_beta_desc.base_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;When your armor breaks, the first shot on every enemy will cause that enemy to stagger. This effect ends when your armor recovers.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;The effect persists for ##$multipro;## seconds after your armor has recovered.

menu_dragan_desc_codex.base_text: Dragan may be a former cop, but he's a former Croatian cop, which means his methods make the MPDC look like timid babysitters. He was brought to America and accepted into the Payday Gang as a favor to The Butcher. While there were some early suspicions regarding his true loyalties, his ability and commitment are indisputable.
menu_dragan_desc_codex.loc_text: Dragan may be a former cop, but he's a former Croatian cop, which means his methods make the MPDC look like timid babysitters. He was brought to America and accepted into the Payday Gang as a favor to The Butcher. While there were some early suspicions regarding his true loyalties, his ability and commitment are indisputable.

menu_dragon_desc_codex.base_text: In his youth, Jiro was never accepted, until he found his way into the yakuza. Yet even here, despite his loyalty and ability, he was never fully embraced and was ultimately betrayed. Following a lengthy prison term, Jiro has come to America to find his long-lost son, Kento.
menu_dragon_desc_codex.loc_text: In his youth, Jiro was never accepted, until he found his way into the yakuza. Yet even here, despite his loyalty and ability, he was never fully embraced and was ultimately betrayed. Following a lengthy prison term, Jiro has come to America to find his long-lost son, Kento.

menu_drop_soap_beta_desc.base_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;When charging your melee weapon you will counterattack enemies that try to strike you, knocking them down. The knockdown does not deal any damage.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;You gain the ability to counter attack cloakers and their kicks.

menu_ecm_2x_beta_desc.base_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You can now place ##$multibasic;## ECM jammers instead of just one.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;The ECM jammer duration is increased by an additional ##$multipro;## and the ECM feedback duration lasts ##$multipro2;## longer. Pagers are delayed by the ECM jammer.
